com.aplpi.wapreview
Class WmlDeckBuilder.wmlelement

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.aplpi.wapreview.WmlDeckBuilder.wmlelement
Enclosing class:
WmlDeckBuilder
public class WmlDeckBuilder.wmlelement
extends java.lang.Object

This inner class contains knowledge about the WML elements which are supported by this user agent. This is where the WML content is actually interpreted and constructed into the WmlCard (and related) objects.

The following tags are recognised to some extent:

  • <a>
  • <br>
  • <card>
  • <do>
  • <go>
  • <i>
  • <input>
  • <p>
  • <b>
  • <u>
  • <big>
  • <em>
  • <select>
  • <option>
  • <postfield>
  • <onevent>
  • <img>
  • <prev>
  • <refresh>
  • <setvar>
  • <template>
  • <table>
  • <tr>
  • <td>
  • <timer>

Constructor Detail

WmlDeckBuilder.wmlelement

public WmlDeckBuilder.wmlelement(java.lang.String elname,
                                 WmlDeckBuilder b)
Construct a wmlelement of the given name. If the name is not recognised, then it will be ignored (however, recognised elements contained by it will be utilised).
Parameters:
elname - The name of this element
